::Striker/Prowl/Zenyak/Mosquitor/Shredder::

Striker looks at the predacons from the island's edge. He had snuck 
around and now stood behind them. He raises his gun and aims
carefully 
at Hell Beast's head.

"Goodbye, Hell Beast," He says and pulls the trigger. Right before
the 
shot is fired, he is tackled by Zenyak and the shot misses it's mark.

Striker and Zenyak jump to their feet, guns aimed at each other.

"At last I get to kill you, maximal." Zenyak says and fires at
Striker.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Prowl sneaks through the forest, being carefull not to make any
noise. 

He could see Hell Beast from his position.Prowl takes a quiet breath, 
getting ready to jump out and shoot Hell Beast. He launches himself 
from his position, flying at Hell Beast with his gun firing only to
be 
tackled by Mosquitor.

"DIE MAXIMAL!!" Mosquitor yells insanely as the two roll off into the 
forest.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Shredder nods. "Good, let's use her ship then. I don't know who this 
Zardus is..."
